iotc-bsp-debug-log.help: Enable/Disable the bsp debug log, Defaults to 0 logs are disabled.

iotc-debug-output.help: Enable/Disable the debug log, Defaults to 0 disbaled the logs.

iotc-debug-printf.help: Sets an alternative to puts for logs output. Especially useful to synchronize output with mbed-trace

iotc-mqtt-max-payload-size.help: MQTT maximum payload size, Defaults to (1024 * 128) if undefined.

iotc-default-idle-timeout.help: IOTC default idle timeout, Defaults to 1 if undefined.

iotc-max-idle-timeout.help: IOTC maximum idle timeout, Defaults to 5 if undefined.

iotc-mqtt-port.help: IOTC MQTT port number, Defaults to 8883 if undefined.

iotc-mqtt-host.help: IOTC MQTT host configuration. Defaults to mqtt.2030.ltsapis.goog host and port number 8883 if undefined
